column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////If you like mexican chorizo you must try the Los altos Benedict! Its the Perfect blend of crunchy English muffin with creamy chipotle hollandaise sauce
column2: and roasted red peppers smothered in spicy chorizo! And the side of hash browns were just about the best I've EVER had! Â The wildberry juice blend was also quite tasty- thank you to the waitress who suggested it! :)
